== DevStack ==
*   git clone https://github.com/openstack-dev/devstack.git
*   DevStack is a set of scripts and utilities to quickly deploy an OpenStack cloud.

== VisualBox ==
== ubuntu下virsualbox配置host-only网络 ==
*   visualbox 全局设置, ctrl + G
    *   在 Network 里添加一个 adapter，vboxnet0，并设置 ipv4：192.168.56.1，取消 DHCP server（我们要设置静态 IP）。
*   visualbox局部设置, ctrl + S
    *   在 Network 中，attached to 选择 Host-only Adapter，Name 选择 vboxnet0.
*   VirtualBox显示菜单栏，Ctrl(右边的) + C切换到scale mode，Ctrl(右边)+Home 
*   安装Guest Additions, 菜单Devices->Install Guest Additions... or Ctrl(右边) + D
＊  http://www.cnblogs.com/xiangzi888/archive/2012/07/05/2578536.html
